subtitle: Scientific and Technical Center
institute: of the Institute of Ferrous Metallurgy of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine
description: The Institute of Ferrous Metallurgy of the NAS of Ukraine hosts a Scientific and Technical Center for testing metal products, which has the equipment and specialists to conduct the following tests:
tests: tensile tests at room and elevated (150...800°C) temperatures;
dynamic three-point bending at room, elevated, and reduced temperatures;
hardness tests by Brinell, Rockwell, Vickers methods;
microstructure studies with determination of grain size, layer thickness, phase composition, contamination by non-metallic inclusions;
corrosion resistance tests in a weakly aggressive environment with periodic immersion of samples in electrolyte;
other types of tests according to the center's field of authorization.
certification: Tests are carried out on verified and calibrated equipment with the issuance of protocols. The Scientific and Technical Center is accredited by the State Standard of Ukraine.
